title: Foundational College Mathematics Mastery for Enhancing Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level proficiency in four fundamental arithmetic operations
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaborative learning environment optimized for smartphone-based learning. Problem-based learning modules utilizing real-world cases

learning_goals: Learners can solve decimal, ratio, proportion, and percentage problems with ≥85% accuracy
Learners can iteratively improve mathematical problem-solving processes ≥3 times by incorporating peer feedback on online discussion boards
Learners can produce reports applying mathematical reasoning in scenario-based practical assessment tasks

resources: Discussion Forum with Real-Time Chat Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
